problem.markdown:
Can we reduce delay to zero? () Yes (x) No () Yes in most of the cases () Yes in very few cases
What you mean by delay? () time to correctly access the input () time to correctly access the output () average rise time and fall time (x) time taken for the output to come after the input has been captured
The optimum size of each inverter is ________ of its neighbours (x) geometric mean () arithmetic mean () geometric or arithmetic mean () none of the above
If the gate size is increased by n then what will be the effect on its resistance? () increases by n (x) decreases by n () decreases by n2 () remains constant
If the gate size is increased by n then what will be the effect on its capacitance? () increases by n2 (x) increases by n () decreases by n () remains constant
Choose the correct statement from the following. () All the inverters in series are kept to be of same size for minimum delay () The inverter size does not matter as long as the inverter driving the load has very big size () The inverter size does not matter as long as the inverter driving the load has very small size (x) The size of the inverter driving the load is maximum of all and is some multiple of size of the previous inverters For minimum delay, what is the no of inverters in the chain connected in series? () 4 () 5 () 6 (x) need to calculate according to the situation given, it is not fixed.
Let a be the stage ratio of an inverter chain. What is its optimum value to drive a load capacitor with minimum delay? () 4 () 1/e () 2 (x) e
In the above question, if parasitic capacitances are taken into consideration then what is the optimum value of a? (x) 4 () e () 1/e () 2
